name: qusring
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cqus, co(c0, cqg, c1)))

stmt.origin: simpld(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg), wceq(cec(cfv(cur, c0), co(c0, cqg, c1)), cfv(cur, c3)))
stmt.pretty: simpld((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2), c3 ∈ Ring, [(1r ` c0)](c0[~QG]c1)=(1r ` c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, crg), wceq(cec(cfv(cur, c0), co(c0, cqg, c1)), cfv(cur, c3))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, crg), wceq(cec(cfv(cur, c0), co(c0, cqg, c1)), cfv(cur, c3))))

stmt.origin: qus1(c0, c1, c2, c3, cfv(cur, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wa(wcel(c3, crg), wceq(cec(cfv(cur, c0), co(c0, cqg, c1)), cfv(cur, c3))))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cqus, co(c0, cqg, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c2idl, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cqus, co(c0, cqg, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c2idl, c0))
-| wceq(cfv(cur, c0), cfv(cur, c0))

|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, crg))
-| wceq(c3, co(c0, cqus, co(c0, cqg, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(c2idl, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2)→ c3 ∈ Ring)
⊣ c3 =(c0[/s](c0[~QG]c1))
⊣ c2 =(2Ideal ` c0)

comment: If ` S ` is a two-sided ideal in ` R ` , then ` U = R / S ` is a ring, called the quotient ring of ` R ` by ` S ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
